abstract: Shabab militant group claims responsibility for attack on African Union Mission base in southern Somalia, and also claims its rebels killed 50 soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The group claimed to have killed as many as 50 soldiers at a base in Lego, in southern Somalia, in an attack that began with a car bombing.

headline.main: Shabab Militants Attack African Union Base in Somalia
headline.print_headline: Shabab Militants Attack African Union Base in Somalia

snippet: The group claimed to have killed as many as 50 soldiers at a base in Lego, in southern Somalia, in an attack that began with a car bombing.
